bbaw.wsp.parser.accepter

Class ResourceAccepter

  • java.lang.Object
    • bbaw.wsp.parser.accepter.ResourceAccepter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileSystemAccepter, MySQLResourceAccepter, WebAccepter

    public abstract class ResourceAccepter
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class offers methods to read from a config file and to accept crawled files. It follows the Strategy pattern because it capsules the algorithm which check the resources.
    Author:
    Sascha Feldmann (wsp-shk1)
